item.title: Report X-2024081072
item.description:
Report X-2024081072

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-12
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ON Aug 12th a package was discovered at our overgoods station that was not marked or labeled as a dangerous good, however the package was damaged enough that it appeared to be a battery. After opening the package it contained a UN3480 Lithium Ion BAttery, 9, that was rated at 625Wh. The package is currently being held pending disposition.
